Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.

Dozens of looters were detained over several days and most appeared unaware of the value of what was in the museum, gleefully ransacking the gift shop. They thought that the museum shop was the museum, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's top archaeologist.`` These people are ignorant, they are outlaws.'' pads designed by Unequal.`` The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal,'' Michael Vick said in a statement, according to the Associated Press. Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. Before serving 18 months in federal prison on charges related to his role in a dog fighting ring, Michael Vick was the National Football League's highest-paid player and one of the most desired endorsers in sports.
